globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
As you approach the interrogation facility, your ship immediately gets flanked by TIE fighters. “Uh-oh,” says your pilot. “They must have known we were coming.” Blasts surround your ship. “You'd better jump; I have to lose these TIEs.”

You leap out of the side door of the cabin and into the snow, rushing toward the facility.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: Alerted by the dogfight with the TIE fighters, guards are already waiting for you.

You don't have much time to rescue Benex, so you decide to meet them head-on.

{-} The mission will progress when a door to the interrogation facility opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7 or when all heroes are wounded.
Enter the facility.

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when a door to the interrogation facility opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7 or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
With the limp Benex in your arms, you pile into your shuttle as it blasts off. Leia contacts you from her ship. “Well done, team. We saved this one, at least. And maybe he even learned something.”

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 2 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} If the heroes retrieved Benex before the end of Round 5, the heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
Once Benex has recovered, he calls you in for a meeting. “I know it’s not much,” he says. “But I did manage to steal a disk with a small amount of Imperial code while they held me. It may hold a clue to their final plan.” Excited at the possibility, you send the coded information off to analysts, hoping it yields some vital information.

{-} Place Story Mission card “The Last Line” into play facedown. The text on a facedown Story Mission card is hidden information to Rebel players. When the Rebel players need to resolve a story mission, and the active Story Mission card is facedown, that card is turned faceup and is no longer hidden information.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You are forced to retreat, leaving Benex to General Sorin's mercy. The princess is furious. “How can we restore the Republic if we can’t even protect our friends?” Days later, Benex is finally recovered by a convoy raid during transport. He swears he did not break or reveal information, but Leia remains concerned.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} If the heroes retrieved Benex before the end of Round 5, the heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
Once Benex has recovered, he calls you in for a meeting. “I know it’s not much,” he says. “But I did manage to steal a disk with a small amount of Imperial code while they held me. It may hold a clue to their final plan.” Excited at the possibility, you send the coded information off to analysts, hoping it yields some vital information.

{-} Place Story Mission card “The Last Line” into play facedown. The text on a facedown Story Mission card is hidden information to Rebel players. When the Rebel players need to resolve a story mission, and the active Story Mission card is facedown, that card is turned faceup and is no longer hidden information.

globalEvents.name: Open Door 1
globalEvents.eventText: The door to the interrogation facility slides open.

entityProperties.name: Door Facility 1
entityProperties.theText:
A door leads into the secret interrogation facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperials.

globalEvents.name: Open Door 2
globalEvents.eventText: The door to the interrogation facility slides open.

entityProperties.name: Door Facility 2
entityProperties.theText:
A door leads into the secret interrogation facility.

{-} The door is locked to Imperials.

globalEvents.name: Varied Defenses 1
globalEvents.eventText: As you open the door, alarms ring out in the facility.

globalEvents.name: Varied Defenses 2
globalEvents.eventText: A low, raspy and unpleasantly familiar voice growls out: "I knew you'd come here. You have no idea how high the price on your heads is by now. Come in peacefully and you won't be hurt... much."

globalEvents.name: Varied Defenses 3
globalEvents.eventText:
Opening the door triggers a sharp high-pitched beep, and a second later a hidden charge detonates in front of you.

{-} Roll 1 red die. Each Rebel figure within 2 spaces of the door suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

eventActions.theText:
The door to the interrogation chamber is locked tight. Its lock is controlled by a duo of security consoles.

{-} The door to the Interrogation Chamber is locked.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 1
entityProperties.theText:
The security console is one of two that control the door locks of the interrogation chamber.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and slice it.

entityProperties.name: Terminal 2
entityProperties.theText:
The security console is one of two that control the door locks of the interrogation chamber.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and slice it.

eventActions.theText:
To your surprise, you find Princess Leia Organa ahead of you, already searching the base for information.

“Took you long enough!” Leia says as you open the door. “After the disaster at Echo Base I figured you'd need some help. I've found the controls, but there’s another terminal somewhere in the base. Hurry!”

{-} Deploy <color="red">Leia Organa</color> (Rebel Commander) adjacent to the terminal closest to the door.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and slice it.
{-} When both terminals have been claimed, the door to the Interrogation Chamber unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Interrogation Chamber opens.
Guards rush forward to defend the facility.
Block access to the terminals.
Slice the terminals (&Terminals sliced&/2).

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The door to the Interrogation Chamber is locked.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with a terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and slice it.
{-} When both terminals have been claimed, the door to the Interrogation Chamber unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Interrogation Chamber opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7 or when all heroes are wounded.
You open the door to see Benex sprawled out on an interrogation table, looking worn.

entityProperties.name: Benex
entityProperties.theText:
Benex is to weak to walk by himself.

{-} A hero can retrieve Benex.

eventActions.theText: {-} The Rebel mission token represents Benex. A hero can retrieve Benex.
The General questioning him turns to you. "At last we meet," he says, smirking.

“I am General Sorin. But I'm afraid there is no way you can possibly—”

His taunt is cut off by a massive explosion. He ducks as the wall behind him blasts apart. You look outside to see your ship's weapons aimed where the wall used to be. “I lost the TIEs,” your pilot says through your comlink. “Anyone need a lift home?”

entityProperties.name: Blast Zone
entityProperties.theText:
Your pilot has blasted the solid wall to rubble.

{-} The wall in the red highlight does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.

entityProperties.name: Depart 1
entityProperties.theText:
Your ship is hovering over the clearing, ready to take you in.

{-} If a hero is carrying Benex and all heroes are on the Clearing (green highlight), the heroes depart.

entityProperties.name: Depart 2
entityProperties.theText:
Your ship is hovering over the clearing, ready to take you in.

{-} If a hero is carrying Benex and all heroes are on the Clearing (green highlight), the heroes depart.

entityProperties.theText:

{-} If a hero is carrying Benex and all heroes are on the Clearing (green highlight), the heroes depart.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The wall in the red highlight does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.
{-} If a hero is carrying Benex and all heroes are on the Clearing (green highlight), the heroes depart. Click the green highlight and select "Heroes depart".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.
Block access to Benex.
Retrieve Benex.

{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The wall in the red highlight does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents Benex. A hero can retrieve Benex.
{-} If a hero is carrying Benex and all heroes are on the Clearing (green highlight), the heroes depart. Click the green highlight and select "Depart".
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7 or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Second Wave
globalEvents.eventText: More guards rush out of the barracks.

globalEvents.name: Interrogation Chamber Unlocks
globalEvents.eventText: The heavy locks of the door to the interrogation chamber slide off.

entityProperties.name: Door Interrogation Chamber
entityProperties.theText:
This doors is labeled "Interrogation Chamber". Faint voices can be heard from inside.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the Interrogation Chamber.
Enter the Interrogation Chamber.

You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the door lock is still active. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Terminal Success 1
globalEvents.eventText: You finally manage to slice into the terminal, disabling part of the door lock.

entityProperties.theText:
